title: DocsOrb: Organise personal documents
author: Santhosh Komaragiri
excerpt: DocsOrb helps families, students, and expats organize and secure essential life documents with AI-powered checklists, smart search, and instant sharing. Stop losing important paperwork, stay ready when life demands it. Fully private - your data, your device.
text: DocsOrb helps families, students, and expats organize and secure essential life documents with AI-powered checklists, smart search, and instant sharing. Stop losing important paperwork, stay ready when life demands it. Fully private - your data, your device.
